a.n: Tabou Combo, 50 Ans De ScEne - Zénith Paris 2018

p.d: The songs of the legendary Haitian group Tabou Combo evoke exile, combat, survival, wandering and suffering, but also, and above all, the hope of a people that never give up. Tabou Combo celebrates a career that spans fifty years, and almost as many albums, at the Zénith in Paris. Directed by: Laurent Hasse (France, 2018)
